title: The Quest for Quantra
description: After Jacy's home is destroyed by an army of creatures known as Grunks and one of her three brothers is brutally murdered, she sets out for the castle in her native kingdom of Quantra to find answers and justice. Her younger brother, Zane, follows in an attempt to protect his big sister, but Jacy is determined to do whatever necessary to save her kingdom. She is driven by a desire to follow in her father's footsteps as a soldier of Quantra and disregards the traditional gender roles that prevail in her world. Along the way, she forges new friendships that serve to strengthen her resolve to help her troubled kingdom. She comes to realize that a dark prophecy encompasses her journey and she must face a shattering truth to save her kingdom.
author: Rhiannon Elayne Dennis
